short_definition: A factual question that arises in an equity suit because of conflicting evidence. It is an issue of fact rather than an issue of law.
long_definition_html: A factual question that arises in an equity suit because of conflicting evidence. It is an issue of fact rather than an issue of law.
long_definition_markdown: A factual question that arises in an equity suit because of conflicting evidence. It is an issue of fact rather than an issue of law.
long_definition_text: A factual question that arises in an equity suit because of conflicting evidence. It is an issue of fact rather than an issue of law.
